verses.verse: Then <S%H453>Elihu<s%> <S%H3254>continued<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
<S%H3803>"Wait<s%> for me a <S%H2191>little,<s%> and I will <S%H2331>show<s%> you That there is <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> to be <S%H4405>said<s%> in God's behalf.
"I will <S%H5375>fetch<s%> my <S%H1843>knowledge<s%> from <S%H7350>afar,<s%> And I will <S%H5414>ascribe<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> to my <S%H6466>Maker.<s%>
"For <S%H551>truly<s%> my <S%H4405>words<s%> are not <S%H8267>false;<s%> One <S%H8549>who<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in <S%H1844>knowledge<s%> is with you.
<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is <S%H3524>mighty<s%> but does not <S%H3988>despise<s%> [any;] [He is] <S%H3524>mighty<s%> in <S%H3581>strength<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding.<s%>
"He does not <S%H2421>keep<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2421>alive,<s%> But <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> to the <S%H6041>afflicted.<s%>

"He does not <S%H1639>withdraw<s%> His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> But with <S%H4428>kings<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> He has <S%H3427>seated<s%> them <S%H5331>forever,<s%> and they are <S%H1361>exalted.<s%>
"And <S%H518>if<s%> they are <S%H631>bound<s%> in <S%H9108>fetters,<s%> And are <S%H3920>caught<s%> in the <S%H9112>cords<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction,<s%>
Then He <S%H5046>declares<s%> to them their <S%H6467>work<s%> And their <S%H6588>transgressions,<s%> that they have <S%H1396>magnified<s%> themselves.
"And He <S%H1540>opens<s%> their <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> And <S%H559>commands<s%> that they <S%H7725>return<s%> from <S%H205>evil.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> they <S%H8085>hear<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> [Him,] They shall <S%H3615>end<s%> their <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H9185>prosperity,<s%> And their <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H5273>pleasures.<s%>
"But <S%H518>if<s%> they do not <S%H8085>hear,<s%> they shall <S%H5674>perish<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> And they shall <S%H1478>die<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
"But the <S%H2611>godless<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7760>lay<s%> up <S%H639>anger;<s%> They do not <S%H7768>cry<s%> for <S%H7768>help<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> He <S%H631>binds<s%> them.
"They <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H5290>youth,<s%> And their <S%H9130>life<s%> [perishes] among the <S%H6945>cult<s%> <S%H6945>prostitutes.<s%>
"He <S%H2502>delivers<s%> the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> in their <S%H6040>affliction,<s%> And <S%H1540>opens<s%> their <S%H241>ear<s%> in [time of] <S%H3906>oppression.<s%>

"Then <S%H637>indeed,<s%> He <S%H5496>enticed<s%> you from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H9496>distress,<s%> <S%H8478>Instead<s%> of it, a <S%H7338>broad<s%> <S%H7338>place<s%> with <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4164>constraint;<s%> And that <S%H5183>which<s%> was <S%H5183>set<s%> on your <S%H7979>table<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1880>fatness.<s%>
"But you were <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1779>judgment<s%> on the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> <S%H1779>Judgment<s%> and <S%H4941>justice<s%> <S%H8551>take<s%> <S%H8551>hold<s%> [of you.]

"[Beware] <S%H6435>lest<s%> <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H5496>entice<s%> you to <S%H5607>scoffing;<s%> And do not let the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of the <S%H3724>ransom<s%> <S%H5186>turn<s%> you <S%H5186>aside.<s%>
"Will your <S%H9592>riches<s%> <S%H6186>keep<s%> [you] from <S%H9496>distress,<s%> Or <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3981>forces<s%> of [your] <S%H3581>strength<s%>?
"Do not <S%H7602>long<s%> for the <S%H3915>night,<s%> When <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5927>vanish<s%> in their <S%H8478>place.<s%>
"Be <S%H8104>careful,<s%> do not <S%H6437>turn<s%> to <S%H205>evil;<s%> For you have <S%H977>preferred<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> to <S%H6040>affliction.<s%>
<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is <S%H7682>exalted<s%> in His <S%H3581>power;<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is a <S%H4175>teacher<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> Him?
<S%H4310>"Who<s%> has <S%H6485>appointed<s%> Him His <S%H1870>way,<s%> And <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H559>said,<s%> 'Thou hast <S%H6466>done<s%> <S%H9390>wrong<s%>'?
<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> that you should <S%H7679>exalt<s%> His <S%H6467>work,<s%> Of <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> have <S%H7891>sung.<s%>
<S%H3605>"All<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> have <S%H2372>seen<s%> it; <S%H120>Man<s%> <S%H5027>beholds<s%> from <S%H7350>afar.<s%>
<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is <S%H7689>exalted,<s%> and we do not <S%H3045>know<s%> [Him;] The <S%H4557>number<s%> of His <S%H8141>years<s%> is <S%H3808>unsearchable.<s%> <S%H2714><s%>
"For He <S%H1639>draws<s%> up the <S%H9325>drops<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> They <S%H2212>distill<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> from the <S%H108>mist,<s%>
<S%H834>Which<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> <S%H5140>pour<s%> <S%H5140>down,<s%> They <S%H7491>drip<s%> upon <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7227>abundantly.<s%>
"Can anyone <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H4666>spreading<s%> of the <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> The <S%H8663>thundering<s%> of His <S%H5521>pavilion<s%>?
<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> He <S%H6566>spreads<s%> His <S%H216>lightning<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> Him, And He <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H8328>depths<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>
"For by these He <S%H1777>judges<s%> <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> He <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H400>food<s%> in <S%H3527>abundance.<s%>
"He <S%H3680>covers<s%> [His] <S%H3709>hands<s%> with the <S%H216>lightning,<s%> And <S%H6680>commands<s%> it to <S%H6293>strike<s%> the <S%H6293>mark.<s%>
"Its <S%H7452>noise<s%> <S%H5046>declares<s%> His <S%H5921>presence;<s%> The <S%H4735>cattle<s%> <S%H637>also,<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> what is <S%H5927>coming<s%> up.
